extensionDescription.message: It captures the urls that have been visited since its activation until its end

extensionDefaultTitle.description: The text shown in the extension icon tooltip

captureButtonText.description: The text shown in the extension popup capture button

stopCaptureButtonText.description: The text shown in the extension popup stop capture button

captureInitMessage.description: The text shown after the user press the capture button

configurationInstructionsMessage.message: Configure the connection to the MO capture plugin
configurationInstructionsMessage.description: The text shown to the user when no server connection configuration was detected

configurationButtonText.description: The text shown in the extension popup server connection configuration button

hostNameLabelText.message: Host server name or ip address
hostNameLabelText.description: The text of the label that is shown to the user, in the configuration form, to ask for the server name or ip adress

hostPortLabelText.description: The text of the label that is shown to the user, in the configuration form, to ask for the host server port

configurationSubmitButtonText.description: The text shown in the configuration form submit button

serverErrorMessage.message: Error when establishing connection with the MO plugin
serverErrorMessage.description: The message shown when a server error connection is detected

hostIpErrorMessage.message: You must enter a valid host server name  or an IP address
hostIpErrorMessage.description: The message shown to the user when a validation error of host ip occurs

hostPortErrorMessage.message: You must enter a valid host port number
hostPortErrorMessage.description: The message shown to the user when a validation error of host port occurs

mouseMovesCallbackUrlErrorMessage.message: You must enter a valid callback url for the mouse moves capture
mouseMovesCallbackUrlErrorMessage.description: The message shown to the user when a validation error of mouse moves callback url occurs

mouseClicksCallbackUrlErrorMessage.message: You must enter a valid callback url for the mouse clicks capture
mouseClicksCallbackUrlErrorMessage.description: The message shown to the user when a validation error of mouse clicks callback url occurs

mouseUpsCallbackUrlErrorMessage.message: You must enter a valid callback url for the mouse ups capture
mouseUpsCallbackUrlErrorMessage.description: The message shown to the user when a validation error of mouse ups callback url occurs

keystrokesCallbackUrlErrorMessage.message: You must enter a valid callback url for the keystrokes capture
keystrokesCallbackUrlErrorMessage.description: The message shown to the user when a validation error of keystrokes callback url occurs

browserSelectLabelText.message: Select the browser from wich you are using the extension
browserSelectLabelText.description: The text shown in the browser select label

mouseMovesCallbackUrlLabelText.description: The text shown in the mouse moves callback url label

mouseClicksCallbackUrlLabelText.description: The text shown in the mouse clicks callback url label

mouseUpsCallbackUrlLabelText.description: The text shown in the mouse ups callback url label

keystrokesCallbackUrlLabelText.description: The text shown in the keystrokes callback url label
